title: Placements
body:
Ever notice in placements how you get all the trolls in the world, and afkers? I'm 2 placements in, and well... "well i gtg".

AFKers around every fucking corner, but only on this team, right? Right. The way LoL matchmaking works is complete trash. Seems that Thresh is the hot pick for feeding leavers.. hm.

First Game: 
http://puu.sh/eOgSn/175823d69f.png

Second Game: 
http://puu.sh/eOlCl/9baa877690.png

It's completely ridiculous how biased and unfair matchmaking is.
